sub_title: Founder - Mind Your Trap Life Coaching; Experienced Exploration Geoscientist; Performance Artist
summary:
I help ordinary people to connect with their hopes leading to their inner core values with compassion and clarity, while co-creating a safe  but extra-ordinary space filled with freedom, fulfillment, balance, purpose and happiness - as one would dream of it! I welcome you to explore more about life and the possibilities it has for you beyond your procrastination, limitations and inhibitions. Because, everyone is a CEO+COO+CFO of their own life! 

Other than that, I am a professional geoscientist with 20+ years of experience in Upstream Oil & Gas sector, large part of it was with industry-leading organisations (see the work history). At this moment I have taken a break from work, though I am currently exploring "right" opportunities. Feel free to reach out if you have any proposal.
